text: you so hv ban pol tha saum a l laoh banhchiesa puok yeung komaoy kheatkhluon anaknea mneak laey leuklengte anaknea del puok yeung ban brateahkheunh ivean robsa puok yeung now cheamuoy ke bonnaoh . pitabrakd nasa bae puok yeung ban thveu dauchnaoh puok yeung kuchea anak del bampean cheaminkhan
